name: MarketingMomentwithStargazerCreative
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Join Nichole Chapais, the owner of Stargazer Creative™ , as she shares ideas to help engage your community & grow your audience one marketing moment at a time. These marketing tips and tricks will help you effectively engage your audience, build your community, and market your business while staying on brand and sane. 

Stargazer is a woman-owned marketing agency focused on helping to drive customer engagement for solopreneurs & small business owners. Using social media, email marketing, online and traditional marketing campaigns we engage your clients and prospect so you can focus on closing the sale.

Follow us at @stargazercreativema on Facebook & Instagram today.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
